data.title: BannerPlugin
data.description: Add a banner to the top of each generated chunk
content: banner: 'fullhash:[fullhash], chunkhash:[chunkhash], name:[name], filebase:[filebase], query:[query], file:[file]'

data.title: CommonsChunkPlugin
data.description: Extract common modules shared between chunks

data.title: CompressionWebpackPlugin
data.description: Prepare compressed versions of assets to serve them with Content-Encoding
